title: AsPhYiXiA
author: AsPhYiXiA
content: If you are a high roller so to speak on Stake.com i have a offer for youmessage me on telegram asaphttps://t.me/h3dabeatgod(don't msg me if your wager ain't at least $100,000 a day.)

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: From the negative trust feedback on your account, I found this topic of yours: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5458488.0 (archived)And to quote Stunna from the mentioned topic:Quote from: Stunna on July 04, 2023, 12:47:09 AMHave come back from months of inactivity just to say that this is total BS. Looks like a scheme to scam donations on his weird page he made. Just to clarify-We never held this user's money-Itâ€™s all fabricated, fake emails etcSo you are a proven liar and scammer, and you want high rollers to contact you because you have an "offer" for them? Well, good luck with that!

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: AsPhYiXiA on July 22, 2023, 09:41:33 PMIf you are a high roller so to speak on Stake.com i have a offer for youmessage me on telegram asaphttps://t.me/h3dabeatgod(don't msg me if your wager ain't at least $100,000 a day.)You are a schemer with bad intentions people should be aware of the accusation he put on Stake which are all lies then thank Stake for resolving and asking that the thread should be deleted I don't think Stake will give in or come to an agreement with fake accusers, now you are with a new scheme and you are targeting high rollers. Quote from: AsPhYiXiA on July 03, 2023, 11:28:26 PMyou can delete this because the issue has been resolved*i just want to thank Stake for being a awesome company and coming to an agreement with me.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on July 23, 2023, 02:09:13 AMYou are a schemer with bad intentions people should be aware of the accusation he put on Stake which are all lies then thank Stake for resolving and asking that the thread should be deleted I don't think Stake will give in or come to an agreement with fake accusers, now you are with a new scheme and you are targeting high rollers. I don't think that anyone on this forum will fall into trap of such scammers because everyone knows that newbie account if trying to do something without any valid proof is a sign of a scam. I have seen so many such newbie accounts on lending board where they are asking for non-collateral loans, and then claiming that they will give 20% to 50% interest for a weekly loan which is totally unthinkable by lenders because such type of interests are just shown to scam money out of the pockets of those lenders. The guy is trying to find a Stake high-roller who is doing $100k daily wages, but he doesn't know that those high rollers don't have time to reply to such useless threads because they are already earning a lot of money using gambling, and they don't need anyone's interference with their earnings. I hope that @OP has understood that he won't get anything by creating such posts and soon he will stop doing such kind of activities.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: AsPhYiXiA on July 22, 2023, 09:41:33 PMIf you are a high roller so to speak on Stake.com i have a offer for youmessage me on telegram asaphttps://t.me/h3dabeatgod(don't msg me if your wager ain't at least $100,000 a day.)You don't have anything interesting in your post that will interest high rollers, you don't know the mindset of high rollers you come to them not them coming to you, if you're not a high roller too, you cannot call them, pauper cannot call rich people to go down the street and give him something.After Stake here you go again, you are so desperate that your idea is outrageous, get a job, and don't lurk around here with a plan to scam people.You have been tagged anything you post here will be suspicious.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Just a note to anyone reading this topic. If you want people to consider your offers, you should consider building an accounts reputation and not be a pop up guy looking to make a quick buck on the forum. As already stated, high rollers are not going to really read this offer as they likely do not even visit this section of the forum.

comments.body: We are just feeding a troll.He didn't even come back after making this post, and I believe that high rollers are smart enough to not give a shit worth of a f()Â¢|{ to this guy's offer. He's just trying to become smart enough in his words thinking that someone would fall for his nonsense.Not to mention this guy "spilled a glass full of water" on his harddrive in which he's got shitload of BTC - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5460640.msg62585336#msg62585336Lmao ðŸ˜‚

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: I hope that this thread gets locked soon. With all of those inconsistent threads made by OP, he did even claimed that stake had an agreement with him and the issue he has thrown to them has been solved which isn't likely because stunna left him negative trust rating saying that he has made a fake news. I think that with this offer OP trying to do has something to do with bonuses that he wants to take advantage of those gamblers that has this account but @sam is right, those high rollers are most likely not even active in any place like this.
